text: React is a JavaScript library developed by Facebook which, among other things, was used to build Instagram.com. It aims to allow developers to create fast user interfaces for websites and applications alike easily.
React apps are made out of components. A component is a piece of the UI (user interface) that has its own logic and appearance. A component can be as small as a button, or as large as an entire page.
JSX is a JavaScript Extension Syntax used in React to easily write HTML and JavaScript together.
